content:
Serafina Tribeca, located on the ground floor of The Frederick Hotel, opened in July 2017 and upholds its tradition of providing guests with authentic Italian fare set within an upbeat and energetic atmosphere. Serafina Tribeca serves brunch, lunch, dinner, and takeout daily. The restaurant also provides room service to guests of The Frederick.

NOW OPEN FOR BREAKFAST!
Breakfast Service: 7am-11am
